title: Enel : A vendu sa participation dans PJSC Enel Russia
cleaned_sentences: (CercleFinance.com) - Enel announces that it has finalized the sale of all of its participation in PJSC Enel Russia, or 56.43 % of the latter's share capital, at PJSC Lukoil and the combined mutual investment fund GazPrombank -Frezia, for 137 million euros.
Enel has sold all its electricity production assets to Russia, which included around 5.6 GW of conventional capacity and around 300 MW of wind capacity at different stages of development.

The overall transaction has generated a positive effect on the group's consolidated net debt of around 610 million euros and a negative impact on the declared net profit of the group of around 1.3 billion euros, mainly reflecting the release of a currency conversion reserve of around 1.0 billion euros on September 30, 2022.
This accounting effect will have no impact on ordinary economic results, the group explains.
key figures Trading wallet +322.60 % vs +55.59 % for the CAC 40 Performance since May 28, 2008
